attributes.action: RETURN TO RATIONAL THOUGHT AND SANITY IN GOVERNMENT ACTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Politically Correct actions appear to be driven to protect the individual in direct conflict with what most law abiding & decent citizens consider reasonable or socially acceptable behavior.

Examples;
Rights of homosexual / lesbian couples to adopt
•	Isn’t the child’s welfare more important than the adult
•	What choice does the child have in this action
•	What of the child’s human rights to reject such an offer:

Refusal of a Police Officer to shake hands with a superior on the grounds of religious unacceptability 
•	Socially unacceptable, common courtesy requires the offering friendship, typically a handshake  
•	How will this individual perform the role of a Police officer without observing common courtesies
•	How did this person manage to pass through the courses of self defence, restraint of a felon:
Government must reflect and endorse the views of the majority not allow the erosion of socially acceptable behavior to prevail.
